page.title: 11FISHING SEAHOUSES
page.content: Fishing is the reason for Seahouses existence and is based on the harbour which is formed by two piers protecting a bay. There are 29 local boats varying in size from 25 to 60 feet in length. Crabs, lobsters, prawns and white fish are landed some being sold locally and the rest going to markets at Eyemouth and North Shields. Four boats have Salmon Licences. { BOATS:}Brittania, St Ebba, Golden Gate , Promised Land, Ocean Maid, Endeavour,Guide Me, Welcome Home, Fortune, St.Cuthbert 1 & 2, Glad Tidings 1,2,3,& 4, Wesley, Kindly Light, Silver Chord, Chevy Chase, Douglasdale, Fidelis, Respect, Providence, Speedwell, Radiant Way, Investor, Children's Friend, Sovereign Olympic and Provider.
